mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.suggest AS "suggest", a.input_person AS "inputPerson.id", a.input_date AS "inputDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", u.name as "inputPerson.name", a.type as "type"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wdt_t_task_suggest( id, suggest, input_person, input_date, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, type ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{suggest}, #{inputPerson.id}, #{inputDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{type} )
mapper.update: UPDATE wdt_t_task_suggest SET suggest = #{suggest}, input_person = #{inputPerson.id}, input_date = #{inputDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, type = #{type} WHERE id = #{id}
